channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: メモNBCUニュースグループ会長のセサール・コンデが、NBCがロナ・マクダニエルを有料寄稿者から外し、元RNC委員長を雇ったことを謝罪したことをスタッフに伝えた。
item.description:
Axios:
Memo: NBCU News Group Chair Cesar Conde tells staff NBC dropped Ronna McDaniel as a paid contributor and apologizes for hiring the former RNC chair  —  NBC has dropped Ronna McDaniel as a paid contributor, NBCU News Group Chair Cesar Conde confirmed in a memo to staff following backlash from some of the network's journalists.

item.title: 分析：2000年以降、ホワイトハウスの31人の報道官のうち16人が、テレビのニュース番組の有料寄稿者、コメンテーター、司会者になった。
item.description:
Axios:
Analysis: 16 of the White House's 31 press secretaries since 2000 have gone on to become paid contributors, commentators, or hosts on TV news programs  —  - Multiple networks scrambled to sign McDaniel when she left the RNC last month, despite her role in former President Trump's efforts …

item.title: AudibleがAmazon MGM Studiosと提携し、Audible OriginalsのコンテンツをベースにしたTVシリーズを共同制作、タイトルはPrime VideoやMGM+などに販売される（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:
Cynthia Littleton / Variety:
Audible partners with Amazon MGM Studios to co-produce TV series based on Audible Originals content; the titles will be shopped to Prime Video, MGM+, and others  —  Kerry Washington, James Patterson, Aaron Korsh are among the notables on board for new iterations of ‘The Prophecy,’ ‘Daniel X: Genesis,’ ‘Nut Jobs’ and others

item.title: UMGがK-POPマネージメント・エージェンシーHybeと10年間のディストリビューション契約を締結、UMGはHybeのスーパーファン・プラットフォームWeverseへの投資とさらなる協力も行う（Murray Stassen/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Murray Stassen / Music Business Worldwide:
UMG strikes a 10-year distribution deal with K-pop management agency Hybe; UMG also will invest in and further collaborate with Hybe's superfan platform Weverse  —  HYBE has struck what it calls an expanded long-term agreement with Universal Music Group (UMG).

item.title: ボストンの公共ラジオ局WBURが予算の10％削減を目指し、従業員にバイアウトを提案中。
item.description:
Aidan Ryan / The Boston Globe:
Boston public radio station WBUR is offering employees buyouts in an effort to cut ~10% of its budget; CEO says WBUR expects to also cut jobs or freeze hiring  —  The popular public radio station has struggled with a loss in advertising revenue  —  WBUR is offering buyouts to employees …

item.title: ソースG/Oメディアのジム・スパンフェラーCEOは、The A.V. ClubとThe Takeoutの売却をスタッフに告げた。
item.description:
Alexandra Steigrad / New York Post:
Source: G/O Media CEO Jim Spanfeller told staff The A.V. Club and The Takeout have been sold; Paste bought The A.V. Club and Static Media bought The Takeout  —  G/O Media, the struggling company that recently sold Deadspin, is shopping popular humor site The Onion and continued its fire sale …

item.title: ケヴィン・シストロムは、AIニュースアプリ「Artifact」は「想像していたよりもずっと少ないコスト」で運営できるため、当面はオンラインを維持すると述べ、2月の閉鎖時期を撤回した（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Kevin Systrom says AI news app Artifact will stay online for now due to taking “a lot less to run it than we had imagined”, reversing a February shutdown date  —  Artifact, the well-received AI-powered news app from Instagram's co-founders, Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger, may not be shutting down as planned.

item.title: 情報筋NBC NewsはNBC/MSNBCのタレントからの反乱を受け、ロナ・マクダニエルを有料寄稿者として降板させる予定。
item.description:
Dylan Byers / @dylanbyers:
Sources: NBC News plans to drop Ronna McDaniel as a paid contributor following on-air revolt from NBC/MSNBC talent; McDaniel is seeking legal representation  —  SCOOP @PuckNews: NBC NEWS plans to drop ex RNC-chair Ronna McDaniel as a paid contributor following on-air revolt from NBC/MSNBC talent. Execs are deliberating over details; announcement pending. Meanwhile, McDaniel is seeking legal representation. Full details, scoops &...

item.title: NFLによると、開幕週の金曜ナイトゲームはNBCのピーコック独占となり、プライム・ビデオは2024-2025年シーズンのプレーオフゲームの独占権を確保した（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
The NFL says the opening week Friday night game will be exclusive to NBC's Peacock, and Prime Video secured exclusive rights for a 2024-2025 season playoff game  —  Brazil game is part of league's effort to expand international presence, have more games not played on Sunday afternoons

item.title: アドビ、ブランドがジェネレーティブAIを使ってコンテンツを作成し、そのパフォーマンスを測定できるようにする「GenStudio」を発表、ブランドの安全性を約束（Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Frederic Lardinois / TechCrunch:
Adobe launches GenStudio to let brands create content and measure its performance using generative AI, underpinned by promises of brand safety  —  Brands want to use generative AI to personalize their marketing efforts — but they are also deathly afraid of AI going off message and ruining their brand.

item.title: カタール王族一族が2019年、2020年にニューズマックスに5,000万ドルを投資。
item.description:
Washington Post:
A member of Qatari royal family invested ~$50M in Newsmax in 2019, 2020; sources: before and after the deal, staffers were urged to soften coverage of Qatar  —  Before and after the investment, senior newsroom leaders urged Newsmax staff to soften coverage of Qatar, current and former employees said

item.title: BBCのティム・デイヴィー事務局長、国営放送をより商業的な運営に変える広範な戦略の一環としてライセンス料改革を要求（Daria Mosolova/Financial Times）
item.description:
Daria Mosolova / Financial Times:
BBC Director General Tim Davie calls for license fee reform as part of a broader strategy to turn the national broadcaster into a more commercial operation  —  Director-general says ‘fundamental questions’ need to be asked as corporation battles flagging demand

item.title: 政治ニュースサイト「Splinter」がリニューアル、G/O MediaからPaste Magazineに買収されて3カ月、Splinterは2019年11月から休眠状態だった（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Political news site Splinter relaunches, three months after it was acquired by Paste Magazine from G/O Media; Splinter has been dormant since November 2019  —  The political news publisher Splinter relaunched Tuesday morning, three months after it was acquired by Paste Magazine in a package deal …

item.title: BBCは『ドクター・フー』のプロモーションに再びAIを使用する予定はない。
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
The BBC has “no plans” to use AI again to promote Doctor Who, after the marketing team used AI “as part of a small trial” to help draft emails and notifications  —  The BBC has “no plans” to use AI again to promote Doctor Who after receiving complaints from viewers.

item.title: トランプ・メディア・アンド・テクノロジー・グループは、DWACとの合併後、ナスダック市場に初登場し、1株当たり57.99ドルで16％上昇し、不採算会社の価値を79億ドルと評価した（Bailey Lipschultz/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Bailey Lipschultz / Bloomberg:
Trump Media & Technology Group closed up 16% at $57.99 per share in its Nasdaq debut, valuing the unprofitable company at $7.9B, following the merger with DWAC  —  - Trump Media & Technology Group operates Truth Social  — Deal provides a windfall on paper for the former president
